<h3 id="X21871">X(21871)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(1); A',B',C',X(37)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(56), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(37)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (b + c) (a^3 + a^2 b - a b^2 - b^3 + a^2 c - 2 a b c + b^2 c - a c^2 + b c^2 - c^3) : :
